verses.verse: וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֲחִיתֹ֖פֶל <S%H302><s%> Moreover Ahithophel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> unto אַבְשָׁלֹ֑ם <S%H53><s%> unto Absalom אֶבְחֲרָ֣ה <S%H977><s%> Let me now choose out נָּ֗א <S%H4994><s%> I beseech thee שְׁנֵים־ <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> ten אֶ֙לֶף֙ <S%H505><s%> thousand אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> men וְאָק֛וּמָה <S%H6965><s%> and I will arise וְאֶרְדְּפָ֥ה <S%H7291><s%> and pursue אַחֲרֵי־ <S%H310><s%> after דָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David הַלָּֽיְלָה׃ <S%H3915><s%> this night

וְאָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> And I will come עָלָ֗יו <S%H5921><s%> and וְה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יָגֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H3023><s%> upon him while he [is] weary וּרְפֵ֣ה <S%H7504><s%> and weak יָדַ֔יִם <S%H3027><s%> handed וְהַֽחֲרַדְתִּ֣י <S%H2729><s%> and will make him afraid אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְנָ֖ס <S%H5127><s%> that [are] with him shall flee כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֑וֹ <S%H854><s%> for וְהִכֵּיתִ֥י <S%H5221><s%> and I will smite אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king לְבַדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H905><s%> alone

וְאָשִׁ֥יבָה <S%H7725><s%> And I will bring back כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> all the people אֵלֶ֑יךָ <S%H413><s%> about כְּשׁ֣וּב <S%H7725><s%> [is] as if all returned הַכֹּ֔ל <S%H3605><s%> of everyone הָאִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> unto thee the man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you מְבַקֵּ֔שׁ <S%H1245><s%> whom thou seekest כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> [so] all the people יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> will be at שָׁלֽוֹם׃ <S%H7965><s%> shall be in peace

וַיִּישַׁ֥ר <S%H3474><s%> pleased הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> And the saying בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> well אַבְשָׁלֹ֑ם <S%H53><s%> Absalom וּבְעֵינֵ֖י <S%H5869><s%> affliction כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all זִקְנֵ֥י <S%H2205><s%> and all the elders יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ס

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <S%H559><s%> Then said אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <S%H53><s%> Absalom קְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> Call נָ֔א <S%H4994><s%> Now גַּ֖ם <S%H1571><s%> also לְחוּשַׁ֣י <S%H2365><s%> now Hushai הָאַרְכִּ֑י <S%H757><s%> the Archite וְנִשְׁמְעָ֥ה <S%H8085><s%> also and let us hear מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> what בְּפִ֖יו <S%H6310><s%> likewise what he saith גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> was come חוּשַׁי֮ <S%H2365><s%> And when Hushai אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְשָׁלוֹם֒ <S%H53><s%> to Absalom וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> spake אַבְשָׁל֨וֹם <S%H53><s%> Absalom אֵלָ֜יו <S%H413><s%> about לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> unto him saying כַּדָּבָ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> after this manner הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> he דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> hath spoken אֲחִיתֹ֔פֶל <S%H302><s%> Ahithophel הֲנַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> shall we do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּבָר֑וֹ <S%H1697><s%> act אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo אַ֖יִן <S%H369><s%> else אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you דַבֵּֽר׃ <S%H1696><s%> speak ס

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said חוּשַׁ֖י <S%H2365><s%> And Hushai אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אַבְשָׁל֑וֹם <S%H53><s%> unto Absalom לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> is not טוֹבָ֧ה <S%H2896><s%> [is] not good הָעֵצָ֛ה <S%H6098><s%> The counsel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after יָעַ֥ץ <S%H3289><s%> hath given אֲחִיתֹ֖פֶל <S%H302><s%> that Ahithophel בַּפַּ֥עַם <S%H6471><s%> at this time הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> For said חוּשַׁ֗י <S%H2365><s%> Hushai אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You יָ֠דַעְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> thou knowest אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָבִ֨יךָ <S%H1><s%> thy father וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲנָשָׁ֜יו <S%H376><s%> [is] a man כִּ֧י <S%H3588><s%> for גִבֹּרִ֣ים <S%H1368><s%> that they [be] mighty men הֵ֗מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like וּמָרֵ֥י <S%H4751><s%> and they [be] chafed נֶ֙פֶשׁ֙ <S%H5315><s%> in their minds הֵ֔מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like כְּדֹ֥ב <S%H1677><s%> as a bear שַׁכּ֖וּל <S%H7909><s%> robbed בַּשָּׂדֶ֑ה <S%H7704><s%> of her whelps in the field וְאָבִ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> and thy father אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> is an expert מִלְחָמָ֔ה <S%H4421><s%> of war וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> and will not יָלִ֖ין <S%H3885><s%> and will not lodge אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> with the people

הִנֵּ֨ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold עַתָּ֤ה <S%H6258><s%> has now הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> himself נֶחְבָּא֙ <S%H2244><s%> Behold he is hid בְּאַחַ֣ת <S%H259><s%> now in some הַפְּחָתִ֔ים <S%H6354><s%> pit א֖וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בְּאַחַ֣ד <S%H259><s%> or in some הַמְּקוֹמֹ֑ת <S%H4725><s%> [other] place וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> has been כִּנְפֹ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> and it will come to pass when some of them be overthrown בָּהֶם֙ בַּתְּחִלָּ֔ה <S%H8462><s%> at the first וְשָׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> that whosoever הַשֹּׁמֵ֙עַ֙ <S%H8085><s%> heareth וְאָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> it will say הָֽיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> has been מַגֵּפָ֔ה <S%H4046><s%> There is a slaughter בָּעָ֕ם <S%H5971><s%> among the people אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> that follow אַבְשָׁלֹֽם׃ <S%H53><s%> Absalom

וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he גַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and even בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> men חַ֗יִל <S%H2428><s%> and [they] which [be] with him [are] valiant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whose לִבּ֛וֹ <S%H3820><s%> whose heart כְּלֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> [is] as the heart הָאַרְיֵ֖ה <S%H738><s%> of a lion הִמֵּ֣ס <S%H4549><s%> shall utterly יִמָּ֑ס <S%H4549><s%> melt כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יֹדֵ֤עַ <S%H3045><s%> knoweth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> for all Israel כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> is a גִבּ֣וֹר <S%H1368><s%> [is] a mighty man אָבִ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> that thy father וּבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> man חַ֖יִל <S%H2428><s%> are valiant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for יָעַ֗צְתִּי <S%H3289><s%> Therefore I counsel הֵ֠אָסֹף <S%H622><s%> be generally יֵאָסֵ֨ף <S%H622><s%> gathered עָלֶ֤יךָ <S%H5921><s%> that כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> that all Israel מִדָּן֙ <S%H1835><s%> unto thee from Dan וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against בְּאֵ֣ר שֶׁ֔בַע <S%H884><s%> even to Beersheba כַּח֥וֹל <S%H2344><s%> as the sand אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is by הַיָּ֖ם <S%H3220><s%> that [is] by the sea לָרֹ֑ב <S%H7230><s%> for multitude וּפָנֶ֥יךָ <S%H6440><s%> in thine own person הֹלְכִ֖ים <S%H1980><s%> and that thou go בַּקְרָֽב׃ <S%H7128><s%> to battle

וּבָ֣אנוּ <S%H935><s%> So shall we come אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> about [בְּאַחַת כ] (בְּאַחַ֤ד <S%H259><s%> one ק) הַמְּקוֹמֹת֙ <S%H4725><s%> place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who נִמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> where he shall be found שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> in it וְנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H5117><s%> cease עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> who יִפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> falleth הַטַּ֖ל <S%H2919><s%> upon him as the dew עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> on the ground וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נ֥וֹתַר <S%H3498><s%> that [are] with him there shall not be left בּ֛וֹ וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <S%H582><s%> and of him and of all the men אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> not גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> so much as אֶחָֽד׃ <S%H259><s%> upon him in some

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> Moreover if אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into עִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> into a city יֵֽאָסֵ֔ף <S%H622><s%> he be gotten וְהִשִּׂ֧יאוּ <S%H5375><s%> bring כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> then shall all Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> to that city הַהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> he חֲבָלִ֑ים <S%H2256><s%> ropes וְסָחַ֤בְנוּ <S%H5498><s%> and we will draw אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> into הַנַּ֔חַל <S%H5158><s%> it into the river עַ֛ד <S%H5704><s%> against אֲשֶֽׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not נִמְצָ֥א <S%H4672><s%> found שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> until there be not one צְרֽוֹר׃ <S%H6872><s%> small stone פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אַבְשָׁלוֹם֙ <S%H53><s%> And Absalom וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> and all the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel טוֹבָ֗ה <S%H2896><s%> [is] better עֲצַת֙ <S%H6098><s%> The counsel חוּשַׁ֣י <S%H2365><s%> of Hushai הָאַרְכִּ֔י <S%H757><s%> the Archite מֵעֲצַ֖ת <S%H6098><s%> than the counsel אֲחִיתֹ֑פֶל <S%H302><s%> of Ahithophel וַיהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD צִוָּ֗ה <S%H6680><s%> had appointed לְהָפֵ֞ר <S%H6565><s%> to defeat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲצַ֤ת <S%H6098><s%> counsel אֲחִיתֹ֙פֶל֙ <S%H302><s%> of Ahithophel הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> the good לְבַעֲב֗וּר <S%H5668><s%> to the intent הָבִ֧יא <S%H935><s%> might bring יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on אַבְשָׁל֖וֹם <S%H53><s%> upon Absalom אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָרָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> evil ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said חוּשַׁ֗י <S%H2365><s%> Hushai אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to צָד֤וֹק <S%H6659><s%> unto Zadok וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to אֶבְיָתָר֙ <S%H54><s%> and to Abiathar הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests כָּזֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְכָזֹ֗את <S%H2063><s%> likewise יָעַ֤ץ <S%H3289><s%> counsel אֲחִיתֹ֙פֶל֙ <S%H302><s%> Thus and thus did Ahithophel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַבְשָׁלֹ֔ם <S%H53><s%> Absalom וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> זִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> and the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְכָזֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְכָזֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> I יָעַ֥צְתִּי <S%H3289><s%> and thus and thus have I counselled אָֽנִי׃ <S%H589><s%> I
